delta=1e-6 -- tolerance
function bisect(f,a,b,fa,fb) local c=(a+b)/2 io.write(n," c=",c," a=",a," b=",b,"\n") if c==a or c==b or math.abs(a-b)<delta then return c,b-a end n=n+1 local fc=f(c) if fa*fc<0 then return bisect(f,a,c,fa,fc) else return bisect(f,c,b,fc,fb) end end
-- find root of f in the inverval [a,b]. needs f(a)*f(b)<0 function solve(f,a,b) n=0 local z,e=bisect(f,a,b,f(a),f(b)) io.write(string.format("after %d steps, root is %.17g with error %.1e, f=%.1e\n",n,z,e,f(z))) end
-- our function function f(x) return x*x*x-x-1 end
-- find zero in [1,2] solve(f,1,2)
